description: '''Inner City''' is an American electronic music group that formed in [[Detroit]], [[Michigan]], in 1987. The group was originally composed of the [[record producer]] and composer [[Kevin Saunderson]] (born September 5, 1964) and the [[Chicago]], [[Illinois]], vocalist [[Paris Grey]] (born November 5, 1965). Saunderson is renowned as one of the [[Belleville Three]]—along with [[Juan Atkins]] and [[Derrick May (musician)|Derrick May]]—high school friends who later originated the [[Detroit techno]] sound. In February 2018, [[Billboard (magazine)|''Billboard'' magazine]] ranked them as the 69th most successful dance artists of all-time.
